title: Multilingual Translation Agent
description: Multi-provider translation switchboard. Translate text using LibreTranslate, OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google Gemini. One stable interface, multiple backends.

text.title: Text to Translate
text.description: The text you want translated. Maximum 10,000 characters (2,000 for LibreTranslate's managed service).

target_language.title: Target Language
target_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the language to translate TO (e.g., es for Spanish, fr for French, de for German, ja for Japanese, zh for Chinese, ar for Arabic, ko for Korean).

source_language.title: Source Language (Optional)
source_language.description: ISO 639-1 code of the source language. Leave blank for auto-detection.

provider.title: Translation Provider
provider.description: Which translation backend to use. All providers require an API key.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API key for the selected provider. Required for all providers. For LibreTranslate, sign up at libretranslate.com to get an API key.

model.title: Model (Optional)
model.description: Model to use for LLM providers. Defaults: OpenAI = gpt-4o-mini, Anthropic = claude-3-5-haiku-latest, Gemini = gemini-2.0-flash. Ignored for LibreTranslate.

endpoint.title: Custom Endpoint (Optional)
endpoint.description: Custom API endpoint URL. For LibreTranslate: your self-hosted instance URL. For OpenAI: Azure OpenAI or OpenRouter-compatible endpoint. Leave blank for default endpoints.

temperature.title: Temperature (Optional)
temperature.description: Controls randomness for LLM providers (0 = deterministic, 1 = creative). Default: 0. Ignored for LibreTranslate.

maxRetries.title: Max Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts on transient failures.

testMode.title: Test Mode
testMode.description: Returns a mock response without calling any translation API. Used for integration testing. Disable and provide an API key for real translations.
